 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקַע‎</span>] **verb** ==beat, stamp, beat out, spread out== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Hiph\`il, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְקַע‎</span> Aph\`el, both ***spread out***, and derivatives; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***press down*** ([[Luke.6.38|Luke 6:38]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]]), ***spread out***, also ***consolidate***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***patch, put on a patch, repair***, compare Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***patch***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***swaddling-bands***, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 90</sup>; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרקע‎</span> ***platter***, or ***bowl***, of gold [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>i. 90, 1</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 1 singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרְקָעֵם‎</span> [[2Sam.22.43|2Sam 22:43]] ***I will stamp them down*** (probably gloss to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲדִקֵּם‎</span> preceding, of. [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]<sup>Ps 18:43</sup>); ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְקַע בְּדַגְלְךָ‎</span> [[Ezek.6.11|Ezek 6:11]] ***beat*** (stamp) with thy foot, in token of contemptuous pleasure, compare [[BDB#Da|Da]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכֵּה בְכַפְּךָ‎</span>); so ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַקְעֲךָ בְּרָ֑גֶל‎</span> [[Ezek.25.6|Ezek 25:6]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַחְאֲךָ יָד‎</span>); ***Participle active*** as substantive construct ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:65d»§ 65d</sup>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹקַע הָאָרֶץ‎</span> (i.e. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>) ***he that*** (beateth out) ***spreadeth out the earth*** [[Isa.42.5|Isa 42:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹקַע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַא‎</span> [[Isa.44.24|Isa 44:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוֺקַע הָא‎</span> [[Ps.136.6|Ps 136:6]]. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּזָּהָב יְרַקְּעֶנּוּ‎</span> [[Isa.40.19|Isa 40:19]] a goldsmith ***with gold over-layeth it*** (literally ***beateth it out*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרַקְּעוּ אֶתֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּחֵי הַזָּהָב‎</span> [[Exod.39.3|Exod 39:3]] ***they beat out the plates of gold***; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְרִקְּעוּם צִפּוּי‎</span> [[Num.17.4|Num 17:4]] ***they beat them out as plating.*** **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּסֶף מְרֻקָּ֑ע‎</span> [[Jer.10.9|Jer 10:9]] ***silver beaten out.*** **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְקִיעַ עִמּוֺ לִשְׁחָקִים‎</span> [[Job.37.18|Job 37:18]] ***canst thou make with*** (= like) ***him a spreading for clouds*** (spread out clouds; cf, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָקִיעַ‎</span>)?
